languages.text: Бочки с замерзшим прометием были выволочены наружу. Нехотя застывшее топливо поддалось жару терморезаков, и костры вспыхнули вокруг корабля. Даже им не под силу разогнать снежную тьму, но люди приободрились от их света и тепла.

Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.
languages.original_text: Бочки с замерзшим прометием были выволочены наружу. Нехотя застывшее топливо поддалось жару терморезаков, и костры вспыхнули вокруг корабля. Даже им не под силу разогнать снежную тьму, но люди приободрились от их света и тепла.

traits.locale_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

languages.text: 一桶桶被冻住的钷素被拖到了船舱外面，在热能切割器炽热的火焰之下，不情愿地燃烧起来。飞船周围燃起了熊熊大火，尽管这并不足以驱散暴风雪中的黑暗，但火焰带来的光亮和温暖却让队员们振奋起来。
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: 一桶桶被冻住的钷素被拖到了船舱外面，在热能切割器炽热的火焰之下，不情愿地燃烧起来。飞船周围燃起了熊熊大火，尽管这并不足以驱散暴风雪中的黑暗，但火焰带来的光亮和温暖却让队员们振奋起来。

languages.text: 凍りついたプロメチウムの樽を外に引きずり出す。氷結した燃料はサーマル・カッターの熱でようやく溶け出し、船の周囲で火が燃え立つ。雪深い闇を払うにはこれでも不十分だが、明るさと温かさが増したことで、隊員は元気を取り戻す。
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: 凍りついたプロメチウムの樽を外に引きずり出す。氷結した燃料はサーマル・カッターの熱でようやく溶け出し、船の周囲で火が燃え立つ。雪深い闇を払うにはこれでも不十分だが、明るさと温かさが増したことで、隊員は元気を取り戻す。

languages.text: Tras sacar barriles de prometio congelado, dicho combustible sucumbe al calor de los cortadores térmicos y se prenden hogueras alrededor de la nave. Ni siquiera esto es suficiente para disipar la oscuridad nevada, pero la gente agradece la luz y el calor de más.
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: Tras sacar barriles de prometio congelado, dicho combustible sucumbe al calor de los cortadores térmicos y se prenden hogueras alrededor de la nave. Ni siquiera esto es suficiente para disipar la oscuridad nevada, pero la gente agradece la luz y el calor de más.

languages.text: Des barils de prométhium gelé sont tirés à l'extérieur. Réchauffé puis embrasé par les découpeurs thermiques, le carburant permet d'allumer des feux tout autour du vaisseau. Même s'ils ne suffisent pas à dissiper les ténèbres enneigées, tout le monde est revigoré par le surcroît de lumière et de chaleur.
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: Des barils de prométhium gelé sont tirés à l'extérieur. Réchauffé puis embrasé par les découpeurs thermiques, le carburant permet d'allumer des feux tout autour du vaisseau. Même s'ils ne suffisent pas à dissiper les ténèbres enneigées, tout le monde est revigoré par le surcroît de lumière et de chaleur.

languages.text: Fässer mit gefrorenem Promethium werden hinausgeschafft. Der Treibstoff erliegt widerwillig der Hitze der Thermalschneider, und rund um das Schiff werden Feuer entzündet. Doch selbst dadurch lässt sich die verschneite Dunkelheit nicht durchdringen, aber immerhin muntern Licht und Wärme die Menschen ein wenig auf.
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: Fässer mit gefrorenem Promethium werden hinausgeschafft. Der Treibstoff erliegt widerwillig der Hitze der Thermalschneider, und rund um das Schiff werden Feuer entzündet. Doch selbst dadurch lässt sich die verschneite Dunkelheit nicht durchdringen, aber immerhin muntern Licht und Wärme die Menschen ein wenig auf.

languages.text: Donmuş prometyum varilleri dışarı sürükleniyor. Donmuş yakıt, termal kesicilerin ısısına istemeden de olsa boyun eğip geminin etrafında tutuşuyor. Karlı karanlığı aydınlatmak için bu bile yeterli olmazken fazladan ışık ve sıcaklık, insanları memnun ediyor.
languages.original_text: Barrels of frozen promethium are dragged outside. The frozen fuel reluctantly succumbs to the heat of the thermal cutters, and fires kindle around the ship. Even this is not enough to dispel the snowy darkness, but the people are buoyed up by the additional light and warmth.

traits.locale_text: Donmuş prometyum varilleri dışarı sürüklendi. Donmuş yakıt, termal kesicilerin ısısına istemeden de olsa boyun eğdi ve geminin etrafında tutuştu. Karlı karanlığı aydınlatmak için bu bile yeterli olmadı ama fazladan ışık ve sıcaklık insanları mutlu etti.
